basicInfo.name: Kang Jae
basicInfo.flavor: Kang Jae finally reunited with his head at the end of his journey — but it was nothing more than dust. And yet, Kang Jae's memories led him down a path for revenge.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Berserk Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Chains of Fury
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 105% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 105% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Rising Fury
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 22%.

profile.story:
Kang Jae is a mysterious ghost that had collapsed at a small, nameless temple.
He is headless and clad in armor, but his eyes and mouth are attached to its torso, which allows him to still communicate freely despite its grotesque appearance.
Having no recollection of their prior life upon regaining consciousness, he felt no distress about his headless condition. If anything, his missing head seemed to have left him rather simple-minded and cheerful.
But one day, Kang Jae learned the location of his missing head in a dream, and now every night, he cautiously continues on his journey to find it.

basicInfo.name: Kang Jae
basicInfo.flavor: One night, the location of Kang Jae's missing head was revealed to him in a dream. After embarking on a quest to find his missing head, his memories gradually began to return.

basicInfo.name: Kang Jae
basicInfo.flavor: Kang Jae is a headless ghost with a mouth and eyes on his torso. Though he could see and speak, he lacked a mind.
